channel.title: Torvapkz v2 Problem![PI]
channel.description:
Well, im now confused about Torvapkz, ah never mind.
--Question : If i put server online, I'll need to log in with The no-ip adress or with 127.0.0.1 Yeah and, It's really online: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2d7zbk.jpg[/img]
----->[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/vqh7vd.jpg[/img]
I cant log in at my webclient if the no-ip is set. Only if im doing 127.0.0.1 then it works..>.< But i dont really know if the other player's can connect than.... >.<
Yep and 43594 is allowed at my firewall.

item.title: Torvapkz v2 Problem![PI]
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Dunder Mifflin:

dontt worry, you can connect through 127.0.0.1. as long as your no-ip is up others can connect too.its basically like your server being a house. everyone goes through the front door. but you have to go through the back door. thats all

Thank YOU! I really love ya :3

Read full topic
